properties.name: Alcudia - Majorca
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukA Good hotel here called Eden Playa. It is a spainish family chain. 4 star apparments, high standards right on the long sandy beaches. Can be windy on this side of the island.

properties.name: Barcelona
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukI went here to see Robbie Williams live. Ace concert! I was lucky enough to be right at the front of the stage to see.

properties.name: Berlin
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukIn 1978 I went on a trip to Berlin with the Solihull Youth Choir. When I went the Berlin wall was still up and we had to drive through the "Corridor" in East German to get to West Berlin. I was not able to walk through the Brandenburg Gate, I hope one day to go back to the City.

properties.name: Cala d'Or, Majorca
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukI have been to this area for a number of holidays. This has to be the best place on the island to eat as you have so many places to go in the town.

properties.name: Cameron House, Lock Lomond
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukThis hotel is wonderful. Set by the Lock Lomond it offers great service for the guest. We had our wedding breakfast here 29th October 2006.

properties.name: Chicago
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukChicago is a great city to go to. I have been lucky to visit this city 4 times. Each visit I learn something new about it.

properties.name: Edinburgh Castle, St. Margaret's Chapel
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukWe got married here at St Margaret\'s Chapel in Edinburgh Castle on the 29th October 2006. a wonderful day. The staff at the castel were ace.

properties.name: Espoo, Finland
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukA few visits to the great Nokia HQ. What a wonderful building. Great phones also.

properties.name: Hagen - Kreyer
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukI have been over to Hagen a number for business as we have an office in Hagen. wonderful town and good people to work with. did my first ever drive on the other side of the road in Hagen.

properties.name: Home in Ruthin
properties.description: Posted by Bigjohnuk44 Maes Cantaba, LL15 1YPThis is our current home in ruthin.

properties.name: House In Sandymoor
properties.description: Posted by Bigjohnuk26 selby close, WA7 1QNThis was my home from Sept 1995 - It was a new build by barrant homes. Three Bed Detached home. Sandymoor is a new village from the early 90\'s. Sandymoor is a wonderful place with plenty of open space.

properties.name: John's Place of Work, 4imprint
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukThis is my place of work. I have been working here since June 2001.

properties.name: Lakeside Hotel
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukÂ This is just a magic hotel! I have been here a number of times and the place is very special for my wife and I.

properties.name: London - The eye
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukLost count the number of times I have bene to London. I did live there once, only 7 months. If you are going to London then do visit the London Eye. It is a great way to see where every thing is before you go visit the various the places.

properties.name: Newark, New York, USA
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukI had to stop off at Newark twice in 2001. On my way home to the UK from Newark I was able to we see the Twin Towers as we came into Newwark Airport and you could see them from the Airport buildings as we waited to get on our plane home. Newark was one of the most friendy airports I have ever been to. The shop and food places were very good. Loved the Chiness take away.

properties.name: Oshkosh -- 4imprint
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukI have visited our offices in Oshkosh a number of times.

properties.name: Paris - 4imprint
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukI have viisted Paris just once to see the office there. Based near the Seine River, you can see the tower.

properties.name: Porto
properties.description: Posted by BigjohnukI went here on a business trip. Had a good weekend with lots to drink.
